company.description: Sakana AI is building a world-class AI research lab in Tokyo. We are focused on developing AI solutions tailored to Japan’s needs, aiming to democratize AI across the country.

recent_partnerships: Sakana AI and Daiwa Securities Group to Develop AI for Advanced Asset Consulting

events.title: First Open House Event for Applied Engineers
events.description: Sakana AI organized its first Open House event aimed at Applied Engineers, with approximately 70 attendees onsite and over 200 participating online.

events.title: Launch of ALE-Agent
events.description: Sakana AI developed ALE-Agent, a coding agent designed to tackle hard optimization problems. In a live competition, ALE-Agent achieved 21st out of 1,000 participants.

events.title: Award at Defense Innovation Challenge
events.description: Sakana AI won an award at a competition hosted by the US Department of Defense and Japan's Ministry of Defense for AI solutions in biodefense and disinformation countermeasures.

events.title: Introduction of Continuous Thought Machine
events.description: Sakana AI introduced the Continuous Thought Machine, a new type of artificial neural network focused on synchronization between neuron dynamics for task-solving.

events.title: Launch of TinySwallow-1.5B Language Model
events.description: Sakana AI developed TinySwallow-1.5B, a small Japanese language model achieving state-of-the-art performance in its category.

events.title: Introduction of CycleQD Technology
events.description: Sakana AI developed CycleQD, a new technology for creating a group of LLM agents focused on lifelong learning.

events.title: Launch of Evo-Ukiyoe and Evo-Nishikie Models
events.description: Sakana AI released Evo-Ukiyoe and Evo-Nishikie, models for generating images from prompts and colorizing illustrations from classical texts.

events.title: Launch of EvoSDXL-JP Model
events.description: Sakana AI introduced EvoSDXL-JP, a fast image generation model that supports Japanese prompts.
